84915f16-b31d-4bd7-bf8e-50306db9323a.name: Business Applications Performance
84915f16-b31d-4bd7-bf8e-50306db9323a.description:
Average of all Business Application performance, so you can track many using a single trend chart. This number should be stable, or its pattern follows your expectation, in a large environment (hundreds of VMs). 

For details, see VCF Operations Transformation book and vSphere Metrics book, which are parts of Operationalize Your World.
